title: Tech Stack
body:
Articles can be linked to using the `<help-article-link>` element.

The help center CMS is built using <help-article-link data-id="gatsby-js" data-text="Gatsby JS"></help-article-link> and <help-article-link data-id="decap-cms" data-text="Decap CMS"></help-article-link>, and is hosted on <help-article-link data-id="netlify" data-text="Netlify" /></help-article-link>.

The search feature is built using <help-article-link data-id="elasticlunr" data-text="Elasticlunr" /></help-article-link>.

If the article link is broken, the link will styled differently:

This broken <help-article-link data-id="not-found" data-text="article link"></help-article-link> doesn't go anywhere.

Articles can also be linked to using a [traditional link](/help/sections/cms/sections/tech-stack/articles/netlify)
